questions.question: Is there a book, is there sci-fi books or series or authors that you find are just amazing?
I mean, how many times have any of us intended to do something helpful and ended up doing something less?
What does it take to get a black belt to excel, to quote unquote, master the art?
If you were to face Khabib, do you think, how would you go about solving that puzzle?
I mean, versus, maybe not appropriate for situation X, Y, or Z, but what should make any of us think?
If it all ended right now, would I be happy with life to this point?
